alert.note: Alert for Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 2:40PM MST until January 08 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 5 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Locally higher amounts are possible closer to the higher terrain. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Huerfano County. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 5 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
